features: Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber compound is durable and grippy
Hand buffed 3D molded toe cap and forefoot outsole creates a sharp edge for enhanced climbing performance
Lug design provides forefoot friction on smooth surfaces and ease of stride on flats
1.7mm nubuck suede leather upper naturally resists tears and abrasion
Compressed EVA midsole provides lasting cushion and support
TPU film and midsole chassis elevate underfoot stability
Gusseted tongue helps minimize debris collection
Versatile tread pattern has friction zones for climbing, lugs for travel on trail
